```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r enrollment-plot}
raw_data <- read_xlsx("mdc_enrol_1819_en_supp.xlsx")

raw_data %>% 
  mutate(Grade = factor(Grade, levels = c("Grade 9", "Grade 10", "Grade 11", "Grade 12")),
         Enrolment = as.double(Enrolment)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% 
  slice(1:15) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(`Course Code`, Enrolment)) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap(~ Grade)
```
